files.description: Implements a CLI-capable validator that loads Claim Card YAML/JSON, validates against the schema, and emits structured failure-mode logs (missing metadata, version ambiguity, correction history issues).

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/claim_card/validate.py
DIR_STATE:["src/claim_card/validate.py"]
SUMMARY: Implemented a CLI-capable Claim Card YAML/JSON validator with optional JSON Schema validation and structured failure-mode JSONL logging for missing metadata, version ambiguity, and correction history issues.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/claim_card/validate.py
DIR_STATE:["src/claim_card/validate.py"]
SUMMARY: Implemented a CLI-capable Claim Card validator that loads YAML/JSON/Markdown front matter, validates via JSON Schema when available, and emits structured failure-mode JSONL logs.

files.description: Parses Markdown Claim Cards with YAML front matter into normalized JSON objects suitable for schema validation and pilot logging.

files.description: Runs the 3-claim pilot by validating three sample Claim Cards, capturing validation outcomes, and writing a consolidated failure-mode report.

missionDescription: Create a Claim Card template (markdown + machine-readable YAML/JSON) and workflow doc, then use it to run the 3-claim pilot and log failure modes (missing metadata, version ambiguity, correction history).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
